name: preapproval_verification_days
title: Within how many days after acceptance of your offer will you deliver your Pre-approval letter?
label: Pre-approval Days
description: Since you aren't providing your pre-approval letter with your offer, you need to do so after acceptance.
tips: Most sellers expect pre-approval verification within 3 days of acceptance.
small_print: The verification timeline begins from the date of offer acceptance. Failure to provide pre-approval documentation within the specified timeframe may affect your offer status.

internal.notes: Days to provide pre-approval verification after acceptance

suggested.hint: The standard number of days is 3.
